disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Ki Barrier.

blurb.value: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

description.value: Innate: After completing an ability's effects, Shen shields himself from 60 − 111 (based on level) (+ 14% bonus health) damage for 2.5 seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one champion, Ki Barrier's  cooldown is reduced by 4 − 7.5 (based on level) seconds.

description2.value: Shen's power manifests as a Spirit Blade that he can control with his abilities.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The Spirit Blade spawns with Shen, teleports closer to him if he gets too far away, and instantly blinks to him if he uses any global blink ( Teleport, Recall, Abyssal Voyage, or Stand United). Enemies see an arrow pointing from Shen to the location of his Spirit Blade even if it is not visible. Twilight Assault will grant the shield if the Spirit Blade reaches Shen. If it is stopped, no shield is granted. Spirit's Refuge will give the shield after the protective zone disappears. Shadow Dash will give the shield when the dash ends. If the dash is interrupted, the shield will instead be received the moment the crowd control source is applied, before damage calculation (if any).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Twilight Assault.

blurb.value: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

description.value: Active: Shen recalls his Spirit Blade to his location. Enemies the blade collides with are slowed for the next 2 seconds when moving away from Shen.

description2.value: Once it arrives, Shen empowers his next 3 basic attacks within 8 seconds to gain  75 bonus range and deal bonus magic damage.

leveling2.value: Bonus Magic Damage:»10 − 40 (based on level) (+ 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)«Total Damage:30 − 120 (based on level) (+ 6 / 7.5 / 9 / 10.5 / 12% (+ 4.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

description3.value: If the Spirit Blade collides with at least one enemy champion on its way to Shen, the empowerment is enhanced, dealing increased bonus magic damage and granting Shen  50% bonus attack speed while it is active.

leveling3.value: Increased Bonus Damage:»10 − 40 (based on level) (+ 5 / 5.5 / 6 / 6.5 / 7% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)«Total Increased Damage:30 − 120 (based on level) (+ 15 / 16.5 / 18 / 19.5 / 21% (+ 6% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

description4.value: Empowered attacks against monsters instead deal 100% bonus damage, but their total damage is capped.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The Spirit Blade will stop in place upon colliding with Wind Wall or Unbreakable. If this occurs, Shen will not receive the empowered attacks.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Spirit's Refuge.

blurb.value: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

description.value: Active: Shen primes his Spirit Blade, creating an area around it. If Shen or an allied champion enter or are within the area, or after 2 seconds, the Spirit Blade creates a protective zone around it for 1.75 seconds, blocking all non- turret basic attacks that hit Shen or allied champions in the area.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spirit's Refuge's protective zone can be moved while active if Shen uses Twilight Assault. Spirit's Refuge cannot be ranked up at Level 1. Spirit's Refuge will also block damage from all abilities that use basic damage ( Lunge, Mystic Shot, Steel Tempest).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shadow Dash.

blurb.value: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

description.value: Passive: Damage from Shadow Dash and Twilight Assault recovers  30 / 35 / 40 (based on level) energy.

description2.value: Active: Shen dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemy champions and monsters in his path and taunting them for 1.5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Casting Flash during Shadow Dash will end the dash prematurely, but enemies at the blink's location will count as being hit by the ability. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Stand United.

blurb.value: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

description.value: Active: Shen channels for 3 seconds, shielding the target allied champion at the time of cast for up to 5 seconds, increased by 0% − 60% (based on target's missing health).

description2.value: Upon completing the channel, Shen and his Spirit Blade blink to the target ally's location, placing himself and his Spirit Blade between them and the nearest enemy champion. Shen also destroys any projectiles targeting him at the time of completion.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Stand United can target allies via the mini map or on their portraits or by using the F2 - F5 keys (none of this can be done if Shen is affected by nearsight or his target is untargetable). Shen will channel so long as his target is alive (even if the granted shield is broken). If his target dies, the channel is canceled and Stand United goes on full cooldown. Interrupting Stand United's channel will not remove the shield prematurely. The target's screen will glow purple to telegraph that Shen has targeted them with Stand United. It will change back when the channel ends. The following table refers for interactions while Shen is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable N/A Disabled All items are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Disabled Spells Usable N/A Disabled Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Mark Dash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death Grounding effects Immobilizing effects Silencing effects
